text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ndh/CodeSystem/ConsentScopeCS defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
adr Advanced Care DirectiveActions to be taken if they are no longer able to make decisions for themselves.
research ResearchConsent to participate in research protocol and information sharing required.
patient-privacy Privacy ConsentAgreement to collect, access, use or disclose (share) information.
treatment TreatmentConsent to undergo a specific treatment.

name: ConsentScopeCS
title: National Healthcare Directory ConsentScopeCodes Code System
publisher: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

description: This value set includes the four Consent scope codes.
